description: Non material amendment to conditions U0183166 (Formerly U0079733 Approved drawings) of 18/3310/NMA and U0079738 (BREEAM for Non-Housing) of planning permission 18/3310/FUL to allow for changes to internal layout, balcony design and depth, fenestration and facades including materials, canopy, north alley width, massing of top floor and provision of BREEAM design stage certificate prior to above ground works
decision_conditions:
